dict.acceptation: 经营者；操作员；电话接线员；运算符；

sent.orig: Some GSM Operator charges different rate for SMS send inter operator and intra-operator.
sent.trans: 一些GSM运营商对发往内部运营商和外部运营商的SMS短消息实行不同的定价。

sent.orig: Operator-Refers to the Cable Operator or the DBS Operator that delivers Program Services to the consumer.
sent.trans: 经营者、台、站-指传送节目给观众的有线台或直播卫星台。

sent.orig: Image segmentation algorithm procedure, using Prewitt operator implementation Laplacian operator are examples of implementation.
sent.trans: 图像分割的算法的程序，用prewitt算子实现的还有laplacian算子实现的例子。

sent.orig: The author emphasizes essentiality of operator quality and advances that operator's education must be compulsory.
sent.trans: 强调了旅游经营者素质的重要性，提出对旅游经营者教育应采取强制的方式。

sent.orig: Extended object-based operator precedence algorithm was proposed on the basis of traditional operator precedence algorithm.
sent.trans: 在传统算符优先归约算法的基础上，提出了扩展的、基于对象的算符优先算法。
